meanings.definition: A short official note, memorandum, or voucher, typically recording a sum owed.
meanings.sent1: The chit from the restaurant showed the total bill.
meanings.sent2: I kept the chit to prove I paid for the repair.
meanings.sent3: The chit for the pizza was so small, I almost lost it!
meanings.sent4: Her chit for the concert ticket was a golden opportunity.
meanings.sent5: The chit with the amount due was as important as a treasure map.

meanings.definition: A small piece of paper or ticket, especially one given as a receipt or for a meal or drink.
meanings.sent1: He handed me the chit after I paid for the groceries.
meanings.sent2: The chit for the raffle had a lucky number on it.
meanings.sent3: The chit for the ice cream was like a sweet little gift.
meanings.sent4: Her chit for the train ride was a ticket to adventure.
meanings.sent5: The chit for the coffee was a small token of appreciation.

meanings.sent4: The curious chit explored every corner of the room.
